meanings.definition: A type of bird with a thick bill and a short, rounded tail.
meanings.sent1: The bullfinches chirped melodiously in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of bullfinches perched on the tree branches.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to imitate the bullfinches' song.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as cheerful as the song of the bullfinches.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant red plumage of the bullfinches caught my eye.
